ygData.subject: RE: Third book doesn't make sence...
ygData.msgSnippet: Great!  Sounds like you may have the 3rd book Oleg!  Please inform us where we may find one.  Or is this just conjecture? Kilkin - Tinkering at a standstill
ygData.messageBody:
Great! Sounds like you may have the 3rd book Oleg! Please inform us where
we may find one. Or is this just conjecture?

Kilkin - Tinkering at a standstill

-----Original Message-----
From: Oleg [mailto:verl@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 1:10 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Third book doesn't make
sence...

From: "Oleg" <verl@...>

The third book contains animated bait, firewater,
collapsible fishing pole,
and Gnomish fireworks. All can be made

-----Original Message-----
From: lockjaw <lockjaw@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 10:23 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Third book doesn't make sence...


>From: lockjaw <lockjaw@...>
>
>If there was a third book, it would seem logical that it
would have
>recipies for things in it other than a collapsable fishing
pole. So why
>aren't we seeing more tinkered items besides this pole come
out of that
>book? Unless all the other formulas in it are broken.
>
>I suspect this is a wild goose chase, and someone,
somewhere is having a
>good laugh at our expense.
>
>Rotgut
>
>>
